recipes.name: Brownie
recipes.longDesc: Mix eggs, sugar, cacao and flour. Add some chocolate.

recipes.name: Cheesecakeds
recipes.longDesc: Heatsdf oven to 350 degrees F. Mix graham crumbs, butter and 1/4 cup sugar; press onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan.

recipes.name: Carbonara
recipes.shortDesc: An easy, foolproof recipe for a classic double-crust cherry pie, made with fresh, sweet cherries.
recipes.longDesc: 1 pound spaghetti.2 large egg yolks.1/2 cup heavy cream. 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil.
